summary: As the police launch a full-scale crackdown on organized crime, it ignites a national yakuza struggle between the Sanno of the East and Hanabishi of the West.
cast: Takeshi Kitano|Toshiyuki Nishida|Fumiyo Kohinata|Ryô Kase|Kenta Kiritani|Hirofumi Arai|Yutaka Matsushige|Hideo Nakano|Tatsuo Nadaka|Ken Mitsuishi|Tetsushi Tanaka|Katsunori Takahashi|Hakuryû|Shun Sugata|Shôken Kunimoto|Syunya Isaka|Daisuke Honda|Ryouhei Abe|Ayumu Saito|Wataru Shihôdô|Jinta Nishizawa|Arata Yamanaka|Ippei Sasaki|Takashi Yamanaka|Maki Hirai|Daisuke Nagakura|Yuuya Takayama|Tsuyoshi Nakano|Yûta Sone|Masayaki Tokumitsu|Koji Mitsumizo|Yuki Nakamura|Keiji Emi|Takahiro Kuroishi|Masanori Okada|Hiroshi Ishii|Osamu Yamamoto|Hidenori Takei|Masanobu Sakata|Yoshimasa Nishijo|Hiroyuki Ishiga|Takashi Kodama|Kenichi Abe|Daisuke Tsukahara|Koji Nakamura|Takuma Sasaki|Kousen|Suwaru Ryu|Eiji Nakamura|Keisuke Hara|Atsushi Ito|Fumiaki Mitsuyama|Tomoharu Nishizawa|Tsuyoshi Gotoh|Tatsuo Heideru|Minoru Nanaeda|Daisuke Hamada|Kenzou Fukutsu|Takayuki Akaike|Yuuki Sanshu|Koji Hatta|Taiga Etoh|Koshi Hoshina|Kura|Takahiro Sakai|Takashi Sakaizawa|Hide Miura|Chigusa Takaku|Kanade Tsutsui|Yane Iwashita|Sarara Tsukifune|Kousuke Ishiduka|Sujin Kim|Tokio Kaneda|Soichiro Kitamura|Takeo Nakahara|Sanshô Shinsui|Ikuji Nakamura|Takahiro Son|Hideki Sekimoto|Noriaki Goto|Taiji Doi|Takashi Aihara|Tetsuya Shirai|Yoshihisa Sadoyama|Tomohide Nishimura|Kei Yoshida|Yasuhiro Yoshiwaka|Hidefumi Hamai|Ryuusyu Ishida|Naoki Kita|Shuhei Umeda|Tutomou Inou|Satoshi Kusaka|Ryuiti Morimoto|Yoshitero Issei|Tadamichi Okubo|Nozomi Hamaguchi|Riubi Isshiki|Takeshi Kunito|Motohisa Yukouchi|Nobuhiro Kato|Shinya Yamada|Akira Nakao|Sansei Shiomi|Shigeru Kôyama|Tomokazu Miura|Sôichirô Kitamura|Suwaru Ryû|Yûya Takayama|Kenta Kamiya|Machiko Ono|Tetsuji Tanaka
title: Outrage 2
